Translations.Text: Be not My signs recounted to you, yet you had been denying them
They will say: Our Lord! Our misgiving prevailed over us. We had been a folk, ones who go astray
Our Lord! Bring us out of this. Then, if ever we reverted, truly, we will be ones who are unjust
He would say: Be driven away in it and speak not to Me
Truly, there had been a group of people of My servants who say: Our Lord! We believed, so forgive us and have mercy on us for Thou art Best of the ones who are most merciful
But you took them to yourselves as a laughing-stock until they caused you to forget My Remembrance and you had been laughing at them
Truly, I gave recompense this Day for what they endured patiently. Truly, they, they are the ones who are victorious
He said: Lingered you in expectation on the earth for what number of years
They said: We lingered in expectation a day or some of a day. So ask the ones who count
He said: You lingered in expectation not but a little. If you had but been knowing
Assumed you that We created you in amusement and that to Us you would not be returned
So exalted be God! The King, The Truth. There is no god but He, the Lord of the Generous Throne
And whoever calls to another god with God of which he has no proof, then, truly, his reckoning is with his Lord. Truly, the ones who are ungrateful will not prosper
And say: My Lord! Forgive and have mercy and Thou art Best of the ones who are most merciful
